text: 2:13 Aghuzir Akaba 21:13; Matyu 5:7; 18:32-35; 25:41-42E fo, gumazamiziba igharaz darazir apangkuvan koghtɨ, God kotiamɨn me tuisɨghamin dughiamɨn, God uaghan men apangkuvighan kogham. Ezɨ gumazim o amizim igharaz darazir apangkufi, God kotiamɨn a tuisɨghamin dughiamɨn a Godɨn apangkuvimɨn ganam.
